definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The soldier said nothing and Mr White asked him again, 'What do I do now?'
sentences.chinese: 軍人一語不發，懷特又問他，“現在我做什麼？”

sentences.english: There, at the edge of town, he released me. And without another word, he turned back toward the town.
sentences.chinese: 在小鎮邊，他放了我，又一語不發地轉身走向小鎮。

sentences.english: Staring at the rude bartender, she was speechless.
sentences.chinese: 她盯着那個粗魯的酒吧侍者，一語不發。

sentences.english: Wordlessly, she rises from the couch .
sentences.chinese: 她一語不發，從長沙發椅上站了起來。

sentences.english: Do you say nothing to the grieving parent?
sentences.chinese: 你會對那悲傷的父母一語不發嗎？

sentences.english: Capital punishment, under a language teacher north king not hair.
sentences.chinese: 極刑之下，王師北一語不發。
